document_data.name: Melinter's Court
document_data.mainbody: '''Melinter's Court''' was a small courtyard that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: This dark courtyard was often engulfed with pipesmoke from curbside philosophers.
document_data.Location: Melinter's Court was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. The buildings forming the court were enclosed by [[Snail Street]] to the southwest and northwest, and by [[Net Street (south)|Net Street]] to the southeast. The courtyard's main entry point was from an unnamed alley to the north.
document_data.History: The court was named for a wicked [[Melinter|mage]] who met his gang here during the 1350's [[DR]] to plan their villainies. Melinter's apprentices still met at the courtyard after his death to discuss their plans. They would put any loitering citizens to ''[[sleep]]'' with their [[magic]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The rear face of the [[Hanged Man (Waterdeep)|Hanged Man]] tavern faced Melinter's Court.
